DDL.statement: CREATE OR REPLACE ALGORITHM = UNDEFINED SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `view_qm_panel_results` AS SELECT APP_QM_PANEL.PANEL_ID, APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY.TRAY_ID, APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.SAMPLE_ID, APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_DATE, APP_QM_PANEL.PANEL_DATE, APP_QM_PANEL.`STATUS`, APP_QM_PANEL.DESCRIPTION AS 'TRAY_DESCRIPTION', APP_QM_PANEL.PLANT, APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.USER_ID, APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.`VALUE`, APP_QM_SELECTLIST.DESCRIPTION AS 'RESULT_DESCRIPTION', APP_QM_SAMPLE.PROCESS_ORDER, APP_QM_SAMPLE.MATERIAL, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_1, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_2, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_3, APP_QM_SAMPLE.USER_DATA_4, APP_QM_USERS.FIRST_NAME, APP_QM_USERS.SURNAME, IF(STRCMP(LEFT(APP_QM_SELECTLIST.DESCRIPTION,4),"INC ")=0,1,0) AS 'INC', IF(STRCMP(APP_QM_SELECTLIST.DESCRIPTION,"IN")=0,1,0) AS 'IN', IF(STRCMP(LEFT(APP_QM_SELECTLIST.DESCRIPTION,4),"OUT ")=0,1,0) AS 'OUT' FROM APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS INNER JOIN APP_QM_SAMPLE ON APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.SAMPLE_ID = APP_QM_SAMPLE.SAMPLE_ID INNER JOIN APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY ON APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.TRAY_ID = APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY.TRAY_ID INNER JOIN APP_QM_PANEL ON APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY.PANEL_ID = APP_QM_PANEL.PANEL_ID INNER JOIN APP_QM_USERS ON APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.USER_ID = APP_QM_USERS.USER_ID INNER JOIN APP_QM_DICTIONARY ON APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.TEST_ID = APP_QM_DICTIONARY.TEST_ID INNER JOIN APP_QM_SELECTLIST ON APP_QM_DICTIONARY.SELECT_LIST_ID = APP_QM_SELECTLIST.SELECT_LIST_ID AND APP_QM_PANEL_TRAY_RESULTS.`VALUE` = APP_QM_SELECTLIST.`VALUE`
